description: Rode Wireless Go II is a wireless dual-channel microphone system. Audio professionals, filmmakers, and A/V enthusiasts may use Wireless Go II transmitters for various projects, including interviews, films, and shows.

When recording audio, the device creates UGG and EGG files to store audio data and metadata . You can then play and modify the audio with the Rode Central desktop and mobile apps before exporting the UGG files to a more common audio format.
